name: HEAD ARENA
description:
This is a small game i made in 3 days

-STORY-

You are a little boy who has ended up in the Head arena and now you need to do your best to survive....

-GAMEPLAY-

This is a small wave based hack and slash game.

It focuses on brutally killing your enemies to survive each wave of trolls and goblins. 

You need high reaction time because the game fetures insta death when you get hit

and on wave 5 and 10 you will face two bosses if you can make it that far....

-CONTENT-

The game includes (at the moment) 10 waves and 2 boss fights each at wave 5 and 10.

There are 5 weapons even though they dont have any impact on gameplay yet.

After wave 10 the game doesnt have any more content.

If people are interested in this game might i add more bosses, weapons and might even add some ranged abilites such as fireballs, throwing axes, lightning bolts or other magic related things.

But all that depends on if anyone is interested.

Thanks for checking out this little game, i would appreciate all feedback and ideas^^
